articles.description: While browsing YouTube's comment section, you might find some offensive comments. And to battle spammers and users using abusive language, the platform
articles.content: While browsing YouTube’s comment section, you might find some offensive comments. And to battle spammers and users using abusive language, the platform has improved its spam detection and bot detecti… [+2968 chars]
